text:
Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas Hosted A Wedding Reception In U.S And It Was A Happy Fam-Jam Affair
Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas Hosted A Wedding Reception In U.S And It Was A Happy Fam-Jam Affair
The jokes and memes around PC and Nick's endless wedding receptions weren't even over that now we have deets about their YET another reception. Nick Jonas' parents Denise and Paul Kevin Jonas hosted a wedding reception in the US and it was a fam-jam affair.
Agencies
PC took to Instagram to share a thank-you message for her family who hosted the party. She wrote,
"Fam jam. Thank you, Denise Jonas and Paul Kevin Jonas for a wonderful reception! We love you! This was amazing."
The reception party was hosted at Nellie's Southern Kitchen. Not many know that the place is also owned by the Jonas family. PC's brother Siddharth Chopra and mother Madhu Chopra too were a part of the grand celebrations.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Have a look at the pictures and videos that will give you a glimpse of all that happened at the party.
title: Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas Hosted A Wedding Reception In U.S And It Was A Happy Fam-Jam Affair
